definition: weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: Applicable to weak base, weak acid, oli, especially resistant to abrasive medium.

sentences.english: The derivative has weak acidity and is stable in weak base solution.
sentences.chinese: 該衍生物具有弱酸性，在弱鹼中穩定。

sentences.english: Because of the strong base giving mesh point is missing, the de-rubber photoptic film .
sentences.chinese: 因爲不弱鹼易使網不面迷失，感平膜脫膠等本體。
